property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.location
property.description: If job tracker is static the history files are stored in this single well known place. If No value is set here, by default, it is in the local file system at ${hadoop.log.dir}/history. 如果作业跟踪器是静态，历史文件应该被存储在单个熟知的地方。 如果没有值在此设置，默认情况下，它在本地文件系统中的${hadoop.log.dir}/history。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.task.numberprogresssplits
property.description: Every task attempt progresses from 0.0 to 1.0 [unless it fails or is killed]. We record, for each task attempt, certain statistics over each twelfth of the progress range. You can change the number of intervals we divide the entire range of progress into by setting this property. Higher values give more precision to the recorded data, but costs more memory in the job tracker at runtime. Each increment in this attribute costs 16 bytes per running task. 每个人物尝试都是进程从0到1的过程， 我们记录了每个任务尝试超过12个可能的范围 你可以改变我们设定了记录人物执行状态的间隔， 更高的数值可以获取更多的任务状态数据

property.name: mapreduce.job.userhistorylocation
property.description: User can specify a location to store the history files of a particular job. If nothing is specified, the logs are stored in output directory. The files are stored in "_logs/history/" in the directory. User can stop logging by giving the value "none". 用户可以指定存储特定作业的历史记录文件的位置 如果未设置，则日志被存储在输出目录，文件被存储在_logs/history/ 设置none可以停止记录日志

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.completed.location
property.description: The completed job history files are stored at this single well known location. If nothing is specified, the files are stored at ${mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.location}/done. 已完成的job历史文件存储在此路径下，如果不设置存储在 ${mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.location}/done.

property.name: mapreduce.job.committer.setup.cleanup.needed
property.description: true, if job needs job-setup and job-cleanup. false, otherwise 如果作业需要作业建立及作业清理操作则设置为ture

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
property.description: The number of streams to merge at once while sorting files. This determines the number of open file handles. 排序文件时，一次合并文件流的数量。这就决定了打开的文件句柄数量。 排序文件的时候一次同时最多可并流的个数

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting files, in megabytes. By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which should minimize seeks. Task排序内部文件时，可用的内存缓冲区，单位MB 默认情况给每个合并流1MB空间

property.name: mapreduce.map.sort.spill.percent
property.description: The soft limit in the serialization buffer. Once reached, a thread will begin to spill the contents to disk in the background. Note that collection will not block if this threshold is exceeded while a spill is already in progress, so spills may be larger than this threshold when it is set to less than .5 序列化缓冲的软限制。 当buffer中的数据达到这个阈值，后台线程会起来对buffer中已有的数据进行排序（spill），然后写入磁盘。 注意如果一个spill在进程中处理时（正在写入硬盘）即使阈值已经被超过，集合也不会阻塞。 所以spill文件大小有可能大于这个阈值，当将阈值设置为小于0.5

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.address
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task. JT 运行的主机名及端口号 default时jobs作为单一的map和reduce人物运行在进程中。

property.name: mapreduce.local.clientfactory.class.name
property.description: This the client factory that is responsible for creating local job runner client 设置负责创建本地作业运行客户端的工厂类

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.http.address
property.description: The job tracker http server address and port the server will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port. 服务器监听的JT的http服务地址及端口 如果端口号为0，则会用一些空闲端口

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.handler.count
property.description: The number of server threads for the JobTracker. This should be roughly 4% of the number of tasktracker nodes. JT的服务线程数，此值应该为TT节点数量的4%左右

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.report.address
property.description: The interface and port that task tracker server listens on. Since it is only connected to by the tasks, it uses the local interface. EXPERT ONLY. Should only be changed if your host does not have the loopback interface. TT服务监听的接口及端口。由于它只能被任务连接，所以它用本地接口。 只有当本机没有环回接口是才需要更改。

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.local.dir
property.description: The local directory where MapReduce stores intermediate data files. May be a comma-separated list of directories on different devices in order to spread disk i/o. Directories that do not exist are ignored. 本地存放MapReduce中间数据文件的目录，可能是一个用逗号分割的在不同硬盘上的目录列表， 此举是为了分担磁盘i/o

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.system.dir
property.description: The directory where MapReduce stores control files. 此目录用于存储MR的控制文件

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.staging.root.dir
property.description: The root of the staging area for users' job files In practice, this should be the directory where users' home directories are located (usually /user) 通常是用户job文件临时存储区域的根

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.temp.dir
property.description: A shared directory for temporary files. 临时文件的共享目录

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.local.dir.minspacestart
property.description: If the space in mapreduce.cluster.local.dir drops under this, do not ask for more tasks.Value in bytes. 如果mapreduce.cluster.local.dir的空间低于这一点，不再要求更多的Task。 以字节为单位。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.local.dir.minspacekill
property.description: If the space in mapreduce.cluster.local.dir drops under this, do not ask more tasks until all the current ones have finished and cleaned up. Also, to save the rest of the tasks we have running, kill one of them, to clean up some space. Start with the reduce tasks, then go with the ones that have finished the least. Value in bytes. 如果mapreduce.cluster.local.dir的空间低于这一点，不再要求更多的Task，直到当前运行的 task已完成且已清除。当然为了保留某些task的正常运行，我们需要杀死他们其中的一个 开启reduce tasks时要保证所有的map tasks已完成。 以字节为单位。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.expire.trackers.interval
property.description: Expert: The time-interval, in miliseconds, after which a tasktracker is declared 'lost' if it doesn't send heartbeats. 如果这个TT不发送心跳， 经过多长时间（单位毫秒）一个 TT会被标记为lost 如果这个TT不发送心跳。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.instrumentation
property.description: Expert: The instrumentation class to associate with each TaskTracker. 与每个TT相关的类声明。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.resourcecalculatorplugin
property.description: Name of the class whose instance will be used to query resource information on the tasktracker. 此类的实例将用于TT查询资源信息 The class must be an instance of org.apache.hadoop.util.ResourceCalculatorPlugin. If the value is null, the tasktracker attempts to use a class appropriate to the platform. Currently, the only platform supported is Linux. 此实例必须是一个org.apache.hadoop.util.ResourceCalculatorPlugin类实例， 若值为空，TT将会使用适合的平台类

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.taskmemorymanager.monitoringinterval
property.description: The interval, in milliseconds, for which the tasktracker waits between two cycles of monitoring its tasks' memory usage. Used only if tasks' memory management is enabled via mapred.tasktracker.tasks.maxmemory. 监控他们任务内存使用情况的周期之间需要等待的时间间隔（单位毫秒）， 只有当任务内存管理启用时，mapred.tasktracker.tasks.maxmemory，此值才有效

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.tasks.sleeptimebeforesigkill
property.description: The time, in milliseconds, the tasktracker waits for sending a SIGKILL to a task, after it has been sent a SIGTERM. This is currently not used on WINDOWS where tasks are just sent a SIGTERM. TT发送 SIGKILL 信号给task时需要等待的时间，TT已然发送了SIGTERM信号。 通常不用于windows因其只接受SIGTERM。

property.name: mapreduce.job.maps
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job. Ignored when mapreduce.jobtracker.address is "local". 每个job的map数，若 mapreduce.jobtracker.address为local 则忽略此值。

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduces
property.description: The default number of reduce tasks per job. Typically set to 99% of the cluster's reduce capacity, so that if a node fails the reduces can still be executed in a single wave. Ignored when mapreduce.jobtracker.address is "local". 默认每个job的reduce数，通常设置为集群reduce的99%，所以当某个节点失败时，这些reduces 仍可以执行。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.restart.recover
property.description: "true" to enable (job) recovery upon restart, "false" to start afresh 设为ture时，使得job恢复在重启时进行。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.block.size
property.description: The block size of the job history file. Since the job recovery uses job history, its important to dump job history to disk as soon as possible. Note that this is an expert level parameter. The default value is set to 3 MB. job历史文件块大小，因为job恢复要使用job历史，因此尽快的将job历史存入 硬盘非常重要，这是高手的配置（普通人别玩），默认值为3MB

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.taskscheduler
property.description: The class responsible for scheduling the tasks.

property.name: mapreduce.job.split.metainfo.maxsize
property.description: The maximum permissible size of the split metainfo file. The JobTracker won't attempt to read split metainfo files bigger than the configured value. 分割元信息文件时所允许的最大大小。 在JobTracker的不会尝试读取大于配置的分割了的元信息文件。 No limits if set to -1.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.taskscheduler.maxrunningtasks.perjob
property.description: The maximum number of running tasks for a job before it gets preempted. No limits if undefined. 设置一个job在被允许执行前，最大可分配的task数量。

property.name: mapreduce.map.maxattempts
property.description: Expert: The maximum number of attempts per map task. In other words, framework will try to execute a map task these many number of times before giving up on it. map task最大尝试次数，即在放弃此map task前会尝试执行的次数。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.maxattempts
property.description: Expert: The maximum number of attempts per reduce task. In other words, framework will try to execute a reduce task these many number of times before giving up on it. reduce task最大尝试次数，即在放弃此reduce task前会尝试执行的次数。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.retry-delay.max.ms
property.description: The maximum number of ms the reducer will delay before retrying to download map data. reducer在尝试重新下载map结果数据时等待时间的上限。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
property.description: The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce during the copy(shuffle) phase. 这个参数决定把 map 输出复制到 reduce 所使用的线程数量。 增加这个值可以提高网络传输速度，加快复制 map 输出的过程，但是也会增加 CPU 使用量。 根据**经验，增加这个值的效果不太明显，建议只在 map 输出非常大的情况下增加这个值。 Reduce shuffle阶段copier线程数。默认是5，对于较大集群，可调整为16~25。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.connect.timeout
property.description: Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce task spends in trying to connect to a tasktracker for getting map output. reduce task 为了获取map输出而尝试与TT联系所花费时间的最大值。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
property.description: Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining connection. 在获得map连接后，reduce task等待map将结果准备好的最大时间。（毫秒）

property.name: mapreduce.task.timeout
property.description: The number of milliseconds before a task will be terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor updates its status string. A value of 0 disables the timeout. 一个task多长时间 既不读又不写，而且不更新其状态，将会被终止。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of map tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker. 一个TT能追踪同时运行的map task最大值

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of reduce tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker. 一个TT能追踪同时运行的reduce task最大值

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.retiredjobs.cache.size
property.description: The number of retired job status to keep in the cache. 保存在cache中的重试job状态的数量

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.outofband.heartbeat
property.description: Expert: Set this to true to let the tasktracker send an out-of-band heartbeat on task-completion for better latency. 设置为ture时，为了获得更少的延时，可以让TT发送一个信号，表明task已完成。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.jobhistory.lru.cache.size
property.description: The number of job history files loaded in memory. The jobs are loaded when they are first accessed. The cache is cleared based on LRU. 加载到内存的job历史文件数，这些工作是在第一次访问时加载，

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.instrumentation
property.description: Expert: The instrumentation class to associate with each JobTracker. 每个JT相关的类声明。

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description:
Java opts for the task tracker child processes. TT子线程的java设置 The following symbol, if present, will be interpolated: @taskid@ is replaced by current TaskID. Any other occurrences of '@' will go unchanged. For example, to enable verbose gc logging to a file named for the taskid in /tmp and to set the heap maximum to be a gigabyte, pass a 'value' of: -Xmx1024m -verbose:gc -Xloggc:/tmp/@taskid@.gc
Usage of -Djava.library.path can cause programs to no longer function if hadoop native libraries are used. These values should instead be set as part of LD_LIBRARY_PATH in the map / reduce JVM env using the mapreduce.map.env and mapreduce.reduce.env config settings.

property.name: mapred.child.env
property.description: User added environment variables for the task tracker child processes. 为TT子线程添加环境变量。 Example : 1) A=foo This will set the env variable A to foo 2) B=$B:c This is inherit nodemanager's B env variable on Unix. 3) B=%B%;c This is inherit nodemanager's B env variable on Windows.

property.name: mapreduce.admin.user.env
property.description: Expert: Additional execution environment entries for map and reduce task processes. This is not an additive property. You must preserve the original value if you want your map and reduce tasks to have access to native libraries (compression, etc). 添加 map reduce线程环境变量

property.name: mapreduce.task.tmp.dir
property.description: To set the value of tmp directory for map and reduce tasks. If the value is an absolute path, it is directly assigned. Otherwise, it is prepended with task's working directory. The java tasks are executed with option -Djava.io.tmpdir='the absolute path of the tmp dir'. Pipes and streaming are set with environment variable, TMPDIR='the absolute path of the tmp dir' map及reduce task 的临时目录，

property.name: mapreduce.map.log.level
property.description: The logging level for the map task. The allowed levels are: OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE and ALL.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.log.level
property.description: The logging level for the reduce task. The allowed levels are: OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE and ALL.

property.name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each map task. 每个map task 的虚拟cup数

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each reduce task. 每个reduce task 的虚拟cup数

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.merge.inmem.threshold
property.description: The threshold, in terms of the number of files for the in-memory merge process. When we accumulate threshold number of files we initiate the in-memory merge and spill to disk. A value of 0 or less than 0 indicates we want to DON'T have any threshold and instead depend only on the ramfs's memory consumption to trigger the merge. 内存中合并线程开始合并文件数目的阈值，当内存中文件数达到阈值时，我们启动合并线程将文件spill到磁盘

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.merge.percent
property.description: The usage threshold at which an in-memory merge will be initiated, expressed as a percentage of the total memory allocated to storing in-memory map outputs, as defined by mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.input.buffer.percent. 使用阈值，当达到时开始内存合并，用百分比表示

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.input.buffer.percent
property.description: The percentage of memory to be allocated from the maximum heap size to storing map outputs during the shuffle. 在shuffle过程中可用于存储map 输出的内存百分比

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.input.buffer.percent
property.description: The percentage of memory- relative to the maximum heap size- to retain map outputs during the reduce. When the shuffle is concluded, any remaining map outputs in memory must consume less than this threshold before the reduce can begin.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.memory.limit.percent
property.description: Expert: Maximum percentage of the in-memory limit that a single shuffle can consume 单一shuffle可用的内存限制的最大百分比。

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.enabled
property.description: Whether to use SSL for for the Shuffle HTTP endpoints.

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.file.buffer.size
property.description: Buffer size for reading spills from file when using SSL. 使用ssl时从文件读取spills到缓冲区的大小。

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.connections
property.description: Max allowed connections for the shuffle. Set to 0 (zero) to indicate no limit on the number of connections. shuffle的最大连接数（0表示无限制）

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.markreset.buffer.percent
property.description: The percentage of memory -relative to the maximum heap size- to be used for caching values when using the mark-reset functionality.

property.name: mapreduce.map.speculative
property.description: If true, then multiple instances of some map tasks may be executed in parallel. 一些map任务的多个实例可以并行执行。

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.speculative
property.description: If true, then multiple instances of some reduce tasks may be executed in parallel. 一些reduce任务的多个实例可以并行执行。

property.name: mapreduce.job.speculative.speculativecap
property.description: The max percent (0-1) of running tasks that can be speculatively re-executed at any time. 任何时刻可以预测性重新执行task的百分比

property.name: mapreduce.job.map.output.collector.class
property.description: It defines the MapOutputCollector implementation to use.

configuration.property: mapreduce.job.speculative.slowtaskthreshold 1.0The number of standard deviations by which a task's ave progress-rates must be lower than the average of all running tasks' for the task to be considered too slow. 通过标准数量来判断一个task的平均进度一定比所有正在运行的task进度的平均值低， 由此认定这个task太慢了。

property.name: mapreduce.job.speculative.slownodethreshold
property.description: The number of standard deviations by which a Task Tracker's ave map and reduce progress-rates (finishTime-dispatchTime) must be lower than the average of all successful map/reduce task's for the TT to be considered too slow to give a speculative task to.

property.name: mapreduce.job.jvm.numtasks
property.description: How many tasks to run per jvm. If set to -1, there is no limit. 每个jvm运行task个数

property.name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.enable
property.description: Whether to enable the small-jobs "ubertask" optimization, which runs "sufficiently small" jobs sequentially within a single JVM. "Small" is defined by the following maxmaps, maxreduces, and maxbytes settings. Users may override this value.

property.name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxmaps
property.description: Threshold for number of maps, beyond which job is considered too big for the ubertasking optimization. Users may override this value, but only downward. map阈值

property.name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxreduces
property.description: Threshold for number of reduces, beyond which job is considered too big for the ubertasking optimization. CURRENTLY THE CODE CANNOT SUPPORT MORE THAN ONE REDUCE and will ignore larger values. (Zero is a valid max, however.) Users may override this value, but only downward. reduce阈值

property.name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxbytes
property.description: Threshold for number of input bytes, beyond which job is considered too big for the ubertasking optimization. If no value is specified, dfs.block.size is used as a default. Be sure to specify a default value in mapred-site.xml if the underlying filesystem is not HDFS. Users may override this value, but only downward. 输入阈值

property.name: mapreduce.input.fileinputformat.split.minsize
property.description: The minimum size chunk that map input should be split into. Note that some file formats may have minimum split sizes that take priority over this setting. map 输入数据应被分成块的最小尺寸。请注意，某些文件格式可能有最低分割大小的优先级高于此设置。

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.maxtasks.perjob
property.description: The maximum number of tasks for a single job. A value of -1 indicates that there is no maximum. 单个作业的最大task数。

property.name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
property.description: The replication level for submitted job files. This should be around the square root of the number of nodes. 提交job文件的复制级别。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.dns.interface
property.description: The name of the Network Interface from which a task tracker should report its IP address. TT应从哪个网络接口报告其ip地址。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.dns.nameserver
property.description: The host name or IP address of the name server (DNS) which a TaskTracker should use to determine the host name used by the JobTracker for communication and display purposes. dns的主机名或ip地址。TT利用这个DNS判断JT的主机名，以达到信息交流及展示的目的。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.http.threads
property.description: The number of worker threads that for the http server. This is used for map output fetching http服务的工作者线程数。这用于获取map输出。

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.http.address
property.description: The task tracker http server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: mapreduce.task.files.preserve.failedtasks
property.description: Should the files for failed tasks be kept. This should only be used on jobs that are failing, because the storage is never reclaimed. It also prevents the map outputs from being erased from the reduce directory as they are consumed.

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress
property.description: Should the job outputs be compressed?

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.type
property.description: If the job outputs are to compressed as SequenceFiles, how should they be compressed? Should be one of NONE, RECORD or BLOCK.

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.codec
property.description: If the job outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed?

property.name: mapreduce.map.output.compress
property.description: Should the outputs of the maps be compressed before being sent across the network. Uses SequenceFile compression.

property.name: mapreduce.map.output.compress.codec
property.description: If the map outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed?

property.name: map.sort.class
property.description: The default sort class for sorting keys.

property.name: mapreduce.task.userlog.limit.kb
property.description: The maximum size of user-logs of each task in KB. 0 disables the cap.

property.name: mapreduce.job.userlog.retain.hours
property.description: The maximum time, in hours, for which the user-logs are to be retained after the job completion.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.hosts.filename
property.description: Names a file that contains the list of nodes that may connect to the jobtracker. If the value is empty, all hosts are permitted.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.hosts.exclude.filename
property.description: Names a file that contains the list of hosts that should be excluded by the jobtracker. If the value is empty, no hosts are excluded.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.heartbeats.in.second
property.description: Expert: Approximate number of heart-beats that could arrive at JobTracker in a second. Assuming each RPC can be processed in 10msec, the default value is made 100 RPCs in a second.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.tasktracker.maxblacklists
property.description: The number of blacklists for a taskTracker by various jobs after which the task tracker could be blacklisted across all jobs. The tracker will be given a tasks later (after a day). The tracker will become a healthy tracker after a restart.

property.name: mapreduce.job.maxtaskfailures.per.tracker
property.description: The number of task-failures on a tasktracker of a given job after which new tasks of that job aren't assigned to it. It MUST be less than mapreduce.map.maxattempts and mapreduce.reduce.maxattempts otherwise the failed task will never be tried on a different node.

property.name: mapreduce.client.output.filter
property.description: The filter for controlling the output of the task's userlogs sent to the console of the JobClient. The permissible options are: NONE, KILLED, FAILED, SUCCEEDED and ALL.

property.name: mapreduce.client.completion.pollinterval
property.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between which the JobClient polls the JobTracker for updates about job status. You may want to set this to a lower value to make tests run faster on a single node system. Adjusting this value in production may lead to unwanted client-server traffic.

property.name: mapreduce.client.progressmonitor.pollinterval
property.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between which the JobClient reports status to the console and checks for job completion. You may want to set this to a lower value to make tests run faster on a single node system. Adjusting this value in production may lead to unwanted client-server traffic.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.persist.jobstatus.active
property.description: Indicates if persistency of job status information is active or not.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.persist.jobstatus.hours
property.description: The number of hours job status information is persisted in DFS. The job status information will be available after it drops of the memory queue and between jobtracker restarts. With a zero value the job status information is not persisted at all in DFS.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.persist.jobstatus.dir
property.description: The directory where the job status information is persisted in a file system to be available after it drops of the memory queue and between jobtracker restarts.

property.name: mapreduce.task.profile
property.description: To set whether the system should collect profiler information for some of the tasks in this job? The information is stored in the user log directory. The value is "true" if task profiling is enabled.

property.name: mapreduce.task.profile.maps
property.description: To set the ranges of map tasks to profile. mapreduce.task.profile has to be set to true for the value to be accounted.

property.name: mapreduce.task.profile.reduces
property.description: To set the ranges of reduce tasks to profile. mapreduce.task.profile has to be set to true for the value to be accounted.

property.name: mapreduce.task.skip.start.attempts
property.description: The number of Task attempts AFTER which skip mode will be kicked off. When skip mode is kicked off, the tasks reports the range of records which it will process next, to the TaskTracker. So that on failures, TT knows which ones are possibly the bad records. On further executions, those are skipped.

property.name: mapreduce.map.skip.proc.count.autoincr
property.description: The flag which if set to true, SkipBadRecords.COUNTER_MAP_PROCESSED_RECORDS is incremented by MapRunner after invoking the map function. This value must be set to false for applications which process the records asynchronously or buffer the input records. For example streaming. In such cases applications should increment this counter on their own.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.skip.proc.count.autoincr
property.description: The flag which if set to true, SkipBadRecords.COUNTER_REDUCE_PROCESSED_GROUPS is incremented by framework after invoking the reduce function. This value must be set to false for applications which process the records asynchronously or buffer the input records. For example streaming. In such cases applications should increment this counter on their own.

property.name: mapreduce.job.skip.outdir
property.description: If no value is specified here, the skipped records are written to the output directory at _logs/skip. User can stop writing skipped records by giving the value "none".

property.name: mapreduce.map.skip.maxrecords
property.description: The number of acceptable skip records surrounding the bad record PER bad record in mapper. The number includes the bad record as well. To turn the feature of detection/skipping of bad records off, set the value to 0. The framework tries to narrow down the skipped range by retrying until this threshold is met OR all attempts get exhausted for this task. Set the value to Long.MAX_VALUE to indicate that framework need not try to narrow down. Whatever records(depends on application) get skipped are acceptable.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.skip.maxgroups
property.description: The number of acceptable skip groups surrounding the bad group PER bad group in reducer. The number includes the bad group as well. To turn the feature of detection/skipping of bad groups off, set the value to 0. The framework tries to narrow down the skipped range by retrying until this threshold is met OR all attempts get exhausted for this task. Set the value to Long.MAX_VALUE to indicate that framework need not try to narrow down. Whatever groups(depends on application) get skipped are acceptable.

property.name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead
property.description: Configuration key to enable/disable IFile readahead.

property.name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
property.description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.taskcache.levels
property.description: This is the max level of the task cache. For example, if the level is 2, the tasks cached are at the host level and at the rack level.

property.name: mapreduce.job.queuename
property.description: Queue to which a job is submitted. This must match one of the queues defined in mapred-queues.xml for the system. Also, the ACL setup for the queue must allow the current user to submit a job to the queue. Before specifying a queue, ensure that the system is configured with the queue, and access is allowed for submitting jobs to the queue.

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.acls.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether ACLs should be checked for authorization of users for doing various queue and job level operations. ACLs are disabled by default. If enabled, access control checks are made by JobTracker and TaskTracker when requests are made by users for queue operations like submit job to a queue and kill a job in the queue and job operations like viewing the job-details (See mapreduce.job.acl-view-job) or for modifying the job (See mapreduce.job.acl-modify-job) using Map/Reduce APIs, RPCs or via the console and web user interfaces. For enabling this flag(mapreduce.cluster.acls.enabled), this is to be set to true in mapred-site.xml on JobTracker node and on all TaskTracker nodes.

property.name: mapreduce.job.acl-modify-job
property.description:
Job specific access-control list for 'modifying' the job. It is only used if authorization is enabled in Map/Reduce by setting the configuration property mapreduce.cluster.acls.enabled to true. This specifies the list of users and/or groups who can do modification operations on the job. For specifying a list of users and groups the format to use is "user1,user2 group1,group". If set to '*', it allows all users/groups to modify this job. If set to ' '(i.e. space), it allows none. This configuration is used to guard all the modifications with respect to this job and takes care of all the following operations: o killing this job o killing a task of this job, failing a task of this job o setting the priority of this job Each of these operations are also protected by the per-queue level ACL "acl-administer-jobs" configured via mapred-queues.xml. So a caller should have the authorization to satisfy either the queue-level ACL or the job-level ACL.
Irrespective of this ACL configuration, (a) job-owner, (b) the user who started the cluster, (c) members of an admin configured supergroup configured via mapreduce.cluster.permissions.supergroup and (d) queue administrators of the queue to which this job was submitted to configured via acl-administer-jobs for the specific queue in mapred-queues.xml can do all the modification operations on a job.
By default, nobody else besides job-owner, the user who started the cluster, members of supergroup and queue administrators can perform modification operations on a job.

property.name: mapreduce.job.acl-view-job
property.description:
Job specific access-control list for 'viewing' the job. It is only used if authorization is enabled in Map/Reduce by setting the configuration property mapreduce.cluster.acls.enabled to true. This specifies the list of users and/or groups who can view private details about the job. For specifying a list of users and groups the format to use is "user1,user2 group1,group". If set to '*', it allows all users/groups to modify this job. If set to ' '(i.e. space), it allows none. This configuration is used to guard some of the job-views and at present only protects APIs that can return possibly sensitive information of the job-owner like o job-level counters o task-level counters o tasks' diagnostic information o task-logs displayed on the TaskTracker web-UI and o job.xml showed by the JobTracker's web-UI Every other piece of information of jobs is still accessible by any other user, for e.g., JobStatus, JobProfile, list of jobs in the queue, etc.
Irrespective of this ACL configuration, (a) job-owner, (b) the user who started the cluster, (c) members of an admin configured supergroup configured via mapreduce.cluster.permissions.supergroup and (d) queue administrators of the queue to which this job was submitted to configured via acl-administer-jobs for the specific queue in mapred-queues.xml can do all the view operations on a job.
By default, nobody else besides job-owner, the user who started the cluster, memebers of supergroup and queue administrators can perform view operations on a job.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.indexcache.mb
property.description: The maximum memory that a task tracker allows for the index cache that is used when serving map outputs to reducers.

property.name: mapreduce.job.token.tracking.ids.enabled
property.description: Whether to write tracking ids of tokens to job-conf. When true, the configuration property "mapreduce.job.token.tracking.ids" is set to the token-tracking-ids of the job

property.name: mapreduce.job.token.tracking.ids
property.description: When mapreduce.job.token.tracking.ids.enabled is set to true, this is set by the framework to the token-tracking-ids used by the job.

property.name: mapreduce.task.merge.progress.records
property.description: The number of records to process during merge before sending a progress notification to the TaskTracker.

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduce.slowstart.completedmaps
property.description: Fraction of the number of maps in the job which should be complete before reduces are scheduled for the job.

property.name: mapreduce.job.complete.cancel.delegation.tokens
property.description: if false - do not unregister/cancel delegation tokens from renewal, because same tokens may be used by spawned jobs

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.taskcontroller
property.description: TaskController which is used to launch and manage task execution

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.group
property.description: Expert: Group to which TaskTracker belongs. If LinuxTaskController is configured via mapreduce.tasktracker.taskcontroller, the group owner of the task-controller binary should be same as this group.

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.port
property.description: Default port that the ShuffleHandler will run on. ShuffleHandler is a service run at the NodeManager to facilitate transfers of intermediate Map outputs to requesting Reducers.

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduce.shuffle.consumer.plugin.class
property.description: Name of the class whose instance will be used to send shuffle requests by reducetasks of this job. The class must be an instance of org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleConsumerPlugin.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.healthchecker.script.path
property.description: Absolute path to the script which is periodicallyrun by the node health monitoring service to determine if the node is healthy or not. If the value of this key is empty or the file does not exist in the location configured here, the node health monitoring service is not started.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.healthchecker.interval
property.description: Frequency of the node health script to be run, in milliseconds

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.healthchecker.script.timeout
property.description: Time after node health script should be killed if unresponsive and considered that the script has failed.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.healthchecker.script.args
property.description: List of arguments which are to be passed to node health script when it is being launched comma seperated.

property.name: mapreduce.job.counters.limit
property.description: Limit on the number of user counters allowed per job.

property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.staging-dir
property.description: The staging dir used while submitting jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.am.max-attempts
property.description: The maximum number of application attempts. It is a application-specific setting. It should not be larger than the global number set by resourcemanager. Otherwise, it will be override. The default number is set to 2, to allow at least one retry for AM.

property.name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.url
property.description: Indicates url which will be called on completion of job to inform end status of job. User can give at most 2 variables with URI : $jobId and $jobStatus. If they are present in URI, then they will be replaced by their respective values.

property.name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.retry.attempts
property.description: The number of times the submitter of the job wants to retry job end notification if it fails. This is capped by mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.attempts

property.name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.retry.interval
property.description: The number of milliseconds the submitter of the job wants to wait before job end notification is retried if it fails. This is capped by mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.retry.interval

property.name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.attempts
property.description: The maximum number of times a URL will be read for providing job end notification. Cluster administrators can set this to limit how long after end of a job, the Application Master waits before exiting. Must be marked as final to prevent users from overriding this.

property.name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.retry.interval
property.description: The maximum amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait before retrying job end notification. Cluster administrators can set this to limit how long the Application Master waits before exiting. Must be marked as final to prevent users from overriding this.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.env
property.description: User added environment variables for the MR App Master processes. Example : 1) A=foo This will set the env variable A to foo 2) B=$B:c This is inherit tasktracker's B env variable.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.admin.user.env
property.description: Environment variables for the MR App Master processes for admin purposes. These values are set first and can be overridden by the user env (yarn.app.mapreduce.am.env) Example : 1) A=foo This will set the env variable A to foo 2) B=$B:c This is inherit app master's B env variable.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.command-opts
property.description:
Java opts for the MR App Master processes. The following symbol, if present, will be interpolated: @taskid@ is replaced by current TaskID. Any other occurrences of '@' will go unchanged. For example, to enable verbose gc logging to a file named for the taskid in /tmp and to set the heap maximum to be a gigabyte, pass a 'value' of: -Xmx1024m -verbose:gc -Xloggc:/tmp/@taskid@.gc
Usage of -Djava.library.path can cause programs to no longer function if hadoop native libraries are used. These values should instead be set as part of LD_LIBRARY_PATH in the map / reduce JVM env using the mapreduce.map.env and mapreduce.reduce.env config settings.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.admin-command-opts
property.description:
Java opts for the MR App Master processes for admin purposes. It will appears before the opts set by yarn.app.mapreduce.am.command-opts and thus its options can be overridden user.
Usage of -Djava.library.path can cause programs to no longer function if hadoop native libraries are used. These values should instead be set as part of LD_LIBRARY_PATH in the map / reduce JVM env using the mapreduce.map.env and mapreduce.reduce.env config settings.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.task.listener.thread-count
property.description: The number of threads used to handle RPC calls in the MR AppMaster from remote tasks

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.client.port-range
property.description: Range of ports that the MapReduce AM can use when binding. Leave blank if you want all possible ports. For example 50000-50050,50100-50200

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.committer.cancel-timeout
property.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the output committer to cancel an operation if the job is killed

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.committer.commit-window
property.description: Defines a time window in milliseconds for output commit operations. If contact with the RM has occurred within this window then commits are allowed, otherwise the AM will not allow output commits until contact with the RM has been re-established.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
property.description: The interval in ms at which the MR AppMaster should send heartbeats to the ResourceManager

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client-am.ipc.max-retries
property.description: The number of client retries to the AM - before reconnecting to the RM to fetch Application Status.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
property.description: The number of client retries to the RM/HS before throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
property.description: The amount of memory the MR AppMaster needs.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
property.description: The number of virtual CPU cores the MR AppMaster needs.

CLASSPATH for MR applications. A comma-separated list of CLASSPATH entries. If mapreduce.application.framework is set then this must specify the appropriate classpath for that archive, and the name of the archive must be present in the classpath. When this value is empty, the following default CLASSPATH for MR applications would be used. For Linux: $HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME/share/hadoop/mapreduce/*, $HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME/share/hadoop/mapreduce/lib/*. For Windows: %HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME%/share/hadoop/mapreduce/*, %HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME%/share/hadoop/mapreduce/lib/*.
property.name: mapreduce.application.classpath
mapreduce.job.classloader
property.description: Whether to use a separate (isolated) classloader for user classes in the task JVM.

property.name: mapreduce.job.classloader.system.classes
property.description: A comma-separated list of classes that should be loaded from the system classpath, not the user-supplied JARs, when mapreduce.job.classloader is enabled. Names ending in '.' (period) are treated as package names, and names starting with a '-' are treated as negative matches.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server IPC host:port

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.keytab
property.description: Location of the kerberos keytab file for the MapReduce JobHistory Server.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.principal
property.description: Kerberos principal name for the MapReduce JobHistory Server.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.cleaner.interval-ms
property.description: How often the job history cleaner checks for files to delete, in milliseconds. Defaults to 86400000 (one day). Files are only deleted if they are older than mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms
property.description: Job history files older than this many milliseconds will be deleted when the history cleaner runs. Defaults to 604800000 (1 week).

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
property.description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.datestring.cache.size
property.description: Size of the date string cache. Effects the number of directories which will be scanned to find a job.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.joblist.cache.size
property.description: Size of the job list cache

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.loadedjobs.cache.size
property.description: Size of the loaded job cache

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.move.interval-ms
property.description: Scan for history files to more from intermediate done dir to done dir at this frequency.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.move.thread-count
property.description: The number of threads used to move files.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.store.class
property.description: The HistoryStorage class to use to cache history data.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.minicluster.fixed.ports
property.description: Whether to use fixed ports with the minicluster

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.http.policy
property.description: This configures the HTTP endpoint for JobHistoryServer web UI. The following values are supported: - HTTP_ONLY : Service is provided only on http - HTTPS_ONLY : Service is provided only on https
